documents.title: man 's body found at house in holymoorside
text: a man 's body was found in the rear of a garden in holymoorside after reports that a woman had been assaulted .
paramedics and police were called to an address off holymore road on monday .
details have only just emerged .
the woman was taken to hospital with head injuries .
derbyshire police are not treating the death as sus and a file has been prepared for the coroner .

documents.title: government 'should do more ' to tackle persecution of raptors
text: the rspb said its figures only represent a fraction of the true scale of the problem and more needs to be done by the government to stop the killing of birds of prey .
the bird crime report revealed nationally there were 196 reports of shooting and destruction of birds of prey and 50 reports of wildlife poisoning and pesticide offences in 2015 .
author: Rory Gallimore
BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: county 'one of worst places ' for birds of prey
text: the rspb has said derbyshire is one of the worst places in the uk for the persecution of birds of prey .
its annual report on bird crime shows at least five raptors were killed in the county in 2015 , after being shot or poisoned .
the 2015 data has only been released today in the charity 's bird crime report .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: radio derby presenter moves to macmillan ward
text: our presenter andy potter has now been moved to the macmillan ward at the royal derby hospital .
just over a week ago , he broke the news to listeners that he had been diagnosed with terminal cancer with months to live .
we caught up with him this morning after his move to the palliative care ward .
it 's lovely in here , it 's actually really quite calming , quite peaceful .
i 've got lots of reflection time obviously but they are looking after me .
it 's all come so quickly really , from last wednesday to where we are now .
you deal with it day by day as it comes along . ''
author: BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: new school building for david nieper academy
text: it will be out with the old and in with the new for one derbyshire school next week .
over a thousand crates will be moved out of the old david nieper academy building in alfreton into a newer modern building .
the new school is a stone 's throw away from the old building next door .
the old site will eventually be demolished .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd

documents.title: children 'at blunt end ' of school strike
text: education secretary justine greening was in the city yesterday and spoke to us about the teaching assistant strikes .

`` i recognise it 's a long running dispute and of course the people at the blunt end of this in the end are the children and the young people in derby 's education system , who want their teaching assistants but obviously do n't have them at the moment .
`` i do hope it can be brought to a resolution .
in the end it 's going to be talks that settle this . ''
author: Wesley Mallin
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: teaching assistants in talks with council over pay
text: teaching assistants in derby are being offered talks with the group which sets the pay bands at derby city council .
